info.title: World of Tanks
info.description:
OpenAPI specification for the Wargaming.net Public API.
The official Wargaming.net Public API documentation can be found at the Wargaming [Developer's room](https://developers.wargaming.net/).

get.description: Method returns partial list of players. The list is filtered by initial characters of user name and sorted alphabetically.

x-enumDescriptions: Search by initial characters of player name. Minimum length: 3 characters. Maximum length: 24 characters. (by default)
Search by exact match of player name. Case insensitive. You can enter several names, separated with commas (up to 100).

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Player name search string. Parameter "type" defines minimum length and type of search. Using the exact search type, you can enter several names, separated with commas. Maximum length: 24.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of returned entries (fewer can be returned, but not more than 100). If the limit sent exceeds 100, a limit of None is applied (by default).

get.description: Method returns player details.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: [Access token](https://developers.wargaming.net/documentation/guide/principles/#access_token) for the private data of a user's account; can be received via the authorization method; valid within a stated time period

parameters.name: extra
parameters.description: Extra fields that will be added to the response.

all.description: Total statistics in Random and clan battles without the Global Map 2.0 statistics

stun_number.description: Number of times an enemy was stunned by you

battles_on_stunning_vehicles.description: Number of battles on vehicles that cause the stun effect

stun_assisted_damage.description: Damage to enemy vehicles stunned by you

track_assisted_damage.description: Damage dealt to the target with the actor keeping-on-track assistance

radio_assisted_damage.description: Damage dealt to the target with the actor radio recon assistance

tanking_factor.description:
Ratio of damage blocked by armor from AP, HEAT, and APCR shells to damage received from these types of shells.
Value is calculated starting from version 9.0.

explosion_hits_received.description: Hits received as a result of splash damage

explosion_hits.description: Hits on enemy as a result of splash damage

no_damage_direct_hits_received.description: Direct hits received that caused no damage

avg_damage_blocked.description:
Average damage blocked by armor per battle. Damage blocked by armor is damage received from shells (AP, HEAT and APCR) that hit a vehicle but caused no damage.
Value is calculated starting from version 9.0.

avg_damage_assisted_track.description:
Average damage upon your shooting the track.
Value is calculated starting from version 8.8.

avg_damage_assisted_radio.description:
Average damage upon your spotting.
Value is calculated starting from version 8.8.

avg_damage_assisted.description:
Average damage caused with your assistance.
Value is calculated starting from version 8.8.

max_damage.description: Maximum damage caused in a battle

max_frags_tank_id.description: Vehicle, in which maximum number of enemy vehicles was destroyed

max_xp_tank_id.description: Vehicle used to gain maximum experience per battle

max_damage_tank_id.description: Vehicle used to cause maximum damage

explosion_hits.description: Hits on enemy as a result of splash damage

no_damage_direct_hits_received.description: Direct hits received that caused no damage

avg_damage_blocked.description:
Average damage blocked by armor per battle. Damage blocked by armor is damage received from shells (AP, HEAT and APCR) that hit a vehicle but caused no damage.
Value is calculated starting from version 9.0.

avg_damage_assisted.description: Average assisted damage without stun damage.

created_at.description: Date when player's account was created

logout_at.description: End time of last game session

personal_missions.description:
Personal Missions Progress. The key is a task id, the value is a status.

Possible statuses:

 * NONE - a mission is unavailable
 * UNLOCKED - a mission is available
 * NEED_GET_MAIN_REWARD - the main reward has not been received
 * MAIN_REWARD_GOTTEN - the main reward has been received
 * NEED_GET_ADD_REWARD - additional reward has not been received
 * NEED_GET_ALL_REWARDS - no rewards have been received
 * ALL_REWARDS_GOTTEN - all rewards have been received
.

battle_life_time.description: Overall battle life time in seconds

is_premium.description: Indicates if the account is Premium Account

blocked.description: The contact was added to the blacklist. Note that the blocked contact still belongs to contact groups or to the ungrouped list of contacts.

is_bound_to_phone.description: Indicates if mobile phone number was added to the account

state.description:
Status of Personal Reserves. Valid values:

 * ACTIVE - Active
 * INACTIVE - Inactive
 * USED - Used

client_language.description: Language selected in the game client

get.description: Method returns details on player's vehicles.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: [Access token](https://developers.wargaming.net/documentation/guide/principles/#access_token) for the private data of a user's account; can be received via the authorization method; valid within a stated time period

mark_of_mastery.description:
Mastery Badges:

 * 0 — None
 * 1 — 3rd Class 
 * 2 — 2nd Class
 * 3 — 1st Class
 * 4 — Ace Tanker

get.description:
Method authenticates user based on Wargaming.net ID (OpenID) which is used in World of Tanks, World of Tanks Blitz, World of Warships, World of Warplanes, and WarGag.ru. To log in, player must enter email and password used for creating account, or use a social network profile.
Authentication is not available for iOS Game Center users in the following cases:
*  the account is not linked to a social network account, or
*  email and password are not specified in the profile.

Information on authorization status is sent to URL specified in **redirect_uri** parameter.

If authentication is successful, the following parameters are sent to **redirect_uri**:

*  **status: ok** — successful authentication
*  **access_token** — access token is passed in to all methods that require authentication
*  **expires_at** — expiration date of **access_token**
*  **account_id** — user ID
*  **nickname** — user name.

If authentication fails, the following parameters are sent to **redirect_uri**:

*  **status: error** — authentication error
*  **code** — error code
*  **message** — error message.

parameters.name: expires_at
parameters.description:
**Access_token** expiration time in UNIX. Delta can also be specified in seconds.

Expiration time and delta must not exceed two weeks from the current time.

parameters.name: redirect_uri
parameters.description:
URL where user is redirected after authentication.

By default: [{API_HOST}/blank/](https://{API_HOST}/blank/)

parameters.name: nofollow
parameters.description: If parameter **nofollow=1** is passed in, the user is not redirected. URL is returned in response.

location.description:
URL where user is redirected for authentication.
This URL is returned only if parameter **nofollow=1** is passed in.

post.description:
Method generates new **access_token** based on the current token.

This method is used when the player is still using the application but the current **access_token** is about to expire.

access_token.description: Access token is passed to all methods requiring authorization.

post.description:
Method deletes user's **access_token**.

After this method is called, **access_token** becomes invalid.

get.description: Method searches through clans and sorts them in a specified order.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Part of name or tag for clan search. Minimum 2 characters

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of returned entries (fewer can be returned, but not more than 100). If the limit sent exceeds 100, a limit of 100 is applied (by default).

parameters.description: Ratings calculation date. Date in UNIX timestamp or ISO 8601 format. E.g.: 1376542800 or 2013-08-15T00:00:00

v10l_avg.description: Average number of vehicles of Tier 10 per clan member

battles_count_avg_daily.description: Average number of battles per day

global_rating_weighted_avg.description: Weighted average of global rating value

exclude_reasons.description:
Reasons why specified rating categories were not calculated. Contains data in "key-value" format, where the key is category name and the value is reason.

Possible reasons:

 * inactivity - Inactivity for 28 days
 * newbies_measure - Under 10 members in the clan
 * limits - Rank conditions not met
 * blocked - Clan blocked
 * other - Technical reasons

tanking_factor.description:
Ratio of damage blocked by armor from AP, HEAT, and APCR shells to damage received from these types of shells.
Value is calculated starting from version 9.0.

explosion_hits_received.description: Hits received as a result of splash damage

explosion_hits.description: Hits on enemy as a result of splash damage

no_damage_direct_hits_received.description: Direct hits received that caused no damage

avg_damage_blocked.description:
Average damage blocked by armor per battle. Damage blocked by armor is damage received from shells (AP, HEAT and APCR) that hit a vehicle but caused no damage.
Value is calculated starting from version 9.0.

avg_damage_assisted_track.description: Average damage upon your shooting the track

avg_damage_assisted.description: Average assisted damage without stun damage.

max_win_points.description: Maximum Victory Points earned in Fallout

max_frags_with_avatar.description: Maximum destroyed in one battle including vehicles destroyed by avatar

max_damage_with_avatar.description: Maximum damage caused in one battle including damage from avatar

frags.description: Details on vehicles destroyed. This data requires a valid access_token for the specified account.

in_garage.description: Availability of vehicle in the Garage. This data requires a valid access_token for the specified account.

mark_of_mastery.description:
Mastery Badges:

 * 0 — None
 * 1 — 3rd Class 
 * 2 — 2nd Class
 * 3 — 1st Class
 * 4 — Ace Tanker

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: [Access token](https://developers.wargaming.net/documentation/guide/principles/#access_token) for the private data of a user's account; can be received via the authorization method; valid within a stated time period

parameters.name: in_garage
parameters.description: Filter by vehicle availability in the Garage. If the parameter is not specified, all vehicles are returned. Parameter processing requires a valid access_token for the specified account_id.

x-enumDescriptions: Return vehicles available in the Garage.
Return vehicles that are no longer in the Garage.

get.description: The method returns percentiles of the distribution of average damage or experience values for each piece of equipment

x-enumDescriptions: Use a distribution based on experience

parameters.name: percentile
parameters.description: A list of percentiles to be included in the response.

distribution.description: Values of these percentiles for each piece of equipment

fields.name: fields
fields.description: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields.

application_id.name: application_id
application_id.description: [Application](https://developers.wargaming.net/applications/) identification key used to send requests to API.
